content.text:
# 1988 Pilkington Glass Championships – Doubles

Svetlana Parkhomenko Larisa Savchenko
| champ    =  Eva Pfaff Elizabeth Smylie
| runner   =  Belinda Cordwell Dianne van Rensburg
| score    = 6–3, 7–6
| edition  =
| type     = singles doubles
}}
Svetlana Parkhomenko and Larisa Savchenko were the defending champions but they competed with different partners that year, Parkhomenko with Leila Meskhi and Savchenko with Natasha Zvereva.
Meskhi and Parkhomenko lost in the second round to Belinda Cordwell and Dianne van Rensburg.
Savchenko and Zvereva lost in the semifinals to Eva Pfaff and Elizabeth Smylie.
Pfaff and Smylie won in the final 6–3, 7–6 against Cordwell and van Rensburg.
Seeds
Champion seeds are indicated in bold text while text in italics indicates the round in which those seeds were eliminated.
Claudia Kohde-Kilsch /  Helena Suková (second round)
#  Lori McNeil /  Betsy Nagelsen (quarterfinals)
#  Gigi Fernández /  Catherine Suire (semifinals)
#  Eva Pfaff /  Elizabeth Smylie (champions)
#  Elise Burgin /  Robin White (second round)
#  Katrina Adams /  Zina Garrison (second round)
#  Rosalyn Fairbank /  Wendy Turnbull (quarterfinals)
#  Leila Meskhi /  Svetlana Parkhomenko (second round)
}}
